item.description:
Do you want to meet new and interesting people? Do you believe in better?

Join the Boston Volunteers community with our fight for better.

This is an event to help you get to know some of your fellow volunteers and contribute any ideas you may have for the group. It's a great event for volunteers coming for the first time who want to know more about us, and for volunteers who have already come to events but want to feel more connected to the community!

 

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

P.S. Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:  
https://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in front of the cafe

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Sip Hot Chocolate and Get Involved in Your Community!
